[Dialog]What good to you, this Stone?

Give it to me, and your life it
may yet buy you.{END}

[Portrait]Beowulf
[Dialog]Reis! At last I've found you!

As I live and breathe, I will let
no harm befall you!{END}

[Portrait]Beowulf
[Dialog]Reis, no!{END}

[Portrait]Beowulf

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Then we have found the dragon you

A companion more dear to me than

But how-?{END}

Who are you?{END}
